name: Phantom
description: Phantoms channel the power of death itself, forming fleeting connections to the spirits of the departed and drawing strength from the boundary between life and death.

3.name: Whispers of the Dead
3.description: You gain a skill or tool proficiency of your choice. You can change this proficiency whenever you finish a long rest, as spirits guide your talents.

3.name: Wails from the Grave
3.description: Immediately after you deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature, you can target a second creature you can see within 30 feet. The second creature takes necrotic damage equal to half the Sneak Attack dice (rounded up). You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

9.name: Tokens of the Departed
9.description: When a creature dies within 30 feet of you, you can capture a soul trinket. While you have a soul trinket, you gain advantage on death saving throws and Constitution saving throws. You can expend a trinket to use Wails from the Grave without expending a normal use.

13.name: Ghost Walk
13.description: You can become incorporeal as a bonus action for 10 minutes. While incorporeal, you gain a flying speed, can move through creatures and objects, and take force damage if you end your turn inside an object. Once used, you canâ€™t use this feature again until you finish a long rest unless you expend a soul trinket.

17.name: Death Knell
17.description: Your Wails from the Grave deals necrotic damage equal to your full Sneak Attack dice instead of half.
